Articles.Content: Hello KSP community! My name is bandman232, and I'm an aspiring Kerbonaught. Since I love your game so much, I have decided to try and post on the forum. Despite the account being old, I haven't gotten around to doing anything here just cuz of school and stuff. But yea! Looking forward to going into SPAAAAAAAAAAAAAACCEEE!!!!!!

Welcome aboard bandman232!

You will have a great journey ahead of you discovering every little thing about this game
Welcome bandman space is great and so is this game so enjoy it as much as possible
